articles.content: Paytm's stock rose as much as 2.80% during the day at Rs 679.85 apiece on the NSE. It was trading 1.50% higher at Rs 671.30 apiece compared to a 0.38% advance in the benchmark Nifty 50 as of 10.53 a.… [+413 chars]

articles.title: Stocks to Watch: Zomato, Maruti Suzuki, SpiceJet, IDFC First Bank | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Balrampur Chini Mills, National Aluminium Company, Delta Corp, Indiabulls Housing Finance, India Cements, SAIL and Zee Entertainment Enterprises are in the F&O ban list for 8 December.
articles.content: Zomato: Svf Growth (Singapore) Pte, part of Japans SoftBank Group, will sell a 1.1% stake in food-delivery company Zomato Ltd Friday for an estimated 1,127.5 crore, or $135 million, as per the term s… [+2825 chars]

articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: X begins rolling out Grok, its ‘rebellious’ chatbot, to subscribers - TechCrunch
articles.description: X is rolling out Grok, its take on AI-powered bots like ChatGPT and Google's Bard. Unlike other chatbots, it has a bit of a mean streak.
articles.content:
Grok, a ChatGPT competitor developed by xAI, Elon Musks AI startup, has officially launched on X, the site formerly known as Twitter.
Grok began rolling out late this afternoon to X Premium Plus sub… [+3698 chars]
